p: In HD1, essential oil consisted of β-copaene, bergamotene, bicyclogermacrene, cubebol, cubenene, and piperitol, and these compounds were not identified in other extracts. Ten compounds using magnesium aluminometasilicate were obtained, and in comparison to the essential oil of HD1, their amount was not large but it was about 13.05 ± 3.54% of the quantity of all of the identified compounds in essential oil.
